p: Swiss albino mice were used in the study. They were obtained from the animal facility of the LBEAS Laboratory, weighing between 22 and 27 g and aged eight weeks. Mice were housed in cages (five mice/cage) in controlled conditions with a temperature of 23 ± 2 °C and a light–dark cycle of 12 h. Before starting the test, the acclimatization period for the animals was two weeks. During the test period, the animals had free access to food and water.
